TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OlkCategoryEvents_KeyUpEventHandler(ref int KeyCode, OlShiftState Shift);
.class public auto ansi sealed OlkCategoryEvents_KeyUpEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OlkCategoryEvents_KeyUpEventHandler(ByRef KeyCode As Integer, Shift As OlShiftState)
public delegate void OlkCategoryEvents_KeyUpEventHandler(int % KeyCode, OlShiftState Shift);

Docs.param: O valor numérico da tecla pressionada.
Uma máscara de bits OR de constantes no enumeração que especifica se as teclas SHIFT, CTRL ou ALT foi pressionadas.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
